allowedParameters.name: q
allowedParameters.description: Query string built as per the SCIM standards that helps to search entered string across contact properties, 'firstName', 'lastName', 'email' and role

allowedParameters.name: offset
allowedParameters.description: This field determines the offset/starting index from which data to be fetched.

allowedParameters.name: limit
allowedParameters.description: This is the field to determine number of records to be fetched per REST call.

allowedParameters.name: sort
allowedParameters.description: This field determines the sort order of the list to be fetched.

allowedParameters.name: X-CCAsset-Language
allowedParameters.description: The asset language of the request

allowedParameters.name: X-CCOrganization
allowedParameters.description: Current organization context of the logged in user
